mapper.select: select a.*,ar.areaName,t.typeName from article a inner join area ar on ar.areaId = a.areaId inner join type t on t.typeId = a.typeId where a.`status` = 2 ORDER BY a.createTime desc
select a.*,ar.areaName,t.typeName from article a inner join area ar on ar.areaId = a.areaId inner join type t on t.typeId = a.typeId where a.`status` = 2 ORDER BY a.hot desc

select tb1.*,COUNT(DISTINCT comId) timeComNum ,COUNT(DISTINCT la.articleId) timeArticleLoveNum ,COUNT(DISTINCT la.articleId)*10+COUNT(DISTINCT comId)*20+COUNT(DISTINCT visitorId) timeHot , COUNT(DISTINCT visitorId) timeVisNum from (select a.* from article a where `status` = 2 and typeId=#{param1} and areaId=#{param2}) tb1 left JOIN love_article la on la.articleId=tb1.articleId and la.updateTime>=now()-interval 15 day LEFT JOIN comment c on tb1.articleId =c.articleId and c.createTime >= now()-interval 15 day LEFT JOIN visitor v on tb1.articleId =v.articleId and v.createTime >= now()-interval 15 day GROUP BY tb1.articleId order by COUNT(la.articleId)*10+COUNT(comId)*20+COUNT(visitorId) desc

select tb1.*,COUNT(DISTINCT comId) timeComNum ,COUNT(DISTINCT la.articleId) timeArticleLoveNum ,COUNT(DISTINCT la.articleId)*10+COUNT(DISTINCT comId)*20+COUNT(DISTINCT visitorId) timeHot , COUNT(DISTINCT visitorId) timeVisNum from (select a.* from article a where `status` = 2 and typeId=#{param1} and areaId=#{param2}) tb1 left JOIN love_article la on la.articleId=tb1.articleId and la.updateTime>=now()-interval 15 day LEFT JOIN comment c on tb1.articleId =c.articleId and c.createTime >= now()-interval 15 day LEFT JOIN visitor v on tb1.articleId =v.articleId and v.createTime >= now()-interval 15 day GROUP BY tb1.articleId order by tb1.createTime desc
select * from articleId where typeId=#{param1} and areaId=#{param2} and status = 2
select t.*,a.* from type t inner join area_type aty on aty.typeId = t.typeId inner join area a on a.areaId = aty.areaId where t.typeName = #{typeName} and a.areaName = #{areaName}
select a.*,ar.areaName,t.typeName from area_type_img a inner join area ar on ar.areaId = a.areaId inner join type t on t.typeId = a.typeId ORDER BY a.createTime desc
